description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. This is a game you can enjoy golf and gambling machine with. Decide an angle and power to put a ball in a cup. Winnings increase as you place the right bets. Maybe the farther the cup, the better the chance. 1 player : Increase your winnings. kinds of the gambling machines be increased when you increase maximum winnings. 2 - 4 players : Compete with other player in scores.
